post.title: 2017 Raffle Fundraiser
post.description:
Come join us at the:North Royalton High School Band Booster Raffle Fundraiser!
Date: Saturday, May
post.content:
Come join us at the:
North Royalton High School Band Booster Raffle Fundraiser!

  • Date: Saturday, May 6
  • Time: 6:00pm - 9:00pm
  • Place: Mastro’s 3-Spot
  • Price: $25 per person

To attend, please print the attached flyer, fill it out and return it (with payment) to the band’s white mailbox or mail it to:

Becky Humes
4408 Akins Road
North Royalton, OH 44133

Please make your check out to The North Royalton Band Boosters. Forms are due April 28. For more information see the attached flyer or contact Anne at iannehdg@gmail.com.

At this time we are also requesting donations for this event. These donations make up all the baskets and door prizes, as well as provide supplies for making the baskets.

Please donate items such as:

  • wine
  • jewelry
  • spa certificates
  • restaurant certificates
  • store gift cards
  • golf items
  • gardening items
  • pet supplies
  • car supplies
  • auto repair certificates
  • sporting goods
  • health club certificates
  • college items/clothing
  • health/beauty supplies or certificates

You can also donate supplies, such as baskets (all sizes), cellophane, ribbon, basket grass, and large poster board.

Contact Anne at iannehdg@gmail.com if you can donate anything.

We are also asking for help in obtaining donations from places you frequent. If asked, businesses are more often willing to give to frequent and favorite customers than just letters being mailed out. Check with your favorite restaurants, stores, salons, etc. to see if they are willing to donate to help support our band. We have attached a donation request letter and a donation form that you can take with you.

Thank you for making this event a success! Hope to see you there!
